sections.title: Introduction
text: We're going to take a deep dive into some components I designed for this website.

The components, while small, had some pretty interesting challeneges. From animation, to responsive design, we'll take a look at all the steps that went into making them using Mantine CSS and framer motion.

sections.title: But first
text: We want to make the components fit within the Mantine CSS framework.

For that, you need be aware of how Mantine suggests components should be written. Thankfully, there's a great guide here you can follow to make your components in a way that blends in with all components provded by the library.
